parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The image contains a CMF number (CMF 11240015). This suggests the post is related to official electoral campaign material.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions and promotes Elena Lasconi, a candidate for the presidential elections in Romania.  The text clearly advocates for her ("În turul 2 votăm Elena Lasconi!"). This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, the content is designed to reach a wide audience, not just a select few. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to support Elena Lasconi in the second round of the presidential elections. The endorsement by Igor Grosu, President of the Parliament of the Republic of Moldova, further amplifies this electoral objective. This clearly fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. It lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic reporting. It's a clear endorsement, not an informative piece.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>While the quote is attributed to Igor Grosu, it's presented within a clear campaign context designed to influence voters. It's not a personal opinion expressed outside of an electoral campaign.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>8547083375402612</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers directly to a candidate (Elena Lasconi), is used during the electoral campaign period (although the exact dates are not specified in the provided data, the context suggests it's within the campaign period), has a clear electoral objective (to increase votes for Lasconi), and goes beyond simple journalistic reporting. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The post's paid nature on a public platform like Facebook ensures wide dissemination.  The counter-argument could be that the post is about the Moldovan elections, but the clear call to vote for Lasconi in the Romanian presidential election overrides this.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate>
    <name>Elena Lasconi</name>
    <impact>POSITIVE</impact>
  </candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>USR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Teodor Lazăr, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 8547083375402612) care constituie propagandă electorală pentru candidatul Elena Lasconi,  prin îndemnul explicit „În turul 2 votăm Elena Lasconi!”,  având ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea acesteia,  în clară încălcare a prevederilor legale privind încheierea campaniei electorale.  Postarea, plătită și vizibilă unui public larg,  conține un mesaj de susținere explicită,  depășind limitele jurnalismului și constituind propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie. Prezența numărului CMF 11240015 confirmă natura electorală a materialului.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
